marklogic.body: I am not going to speculate as to Zimmerman or Trayvon... my WHITE son was Always followed, stopped, questioned by the police where we live... he was harassed by the police and sometimes it was without cause... it happens to both black and white people. Murders happen to both black and white people... I have lost out on jobs I was highly qualified for because the places hadn't met their quota of minority employees... racism is alive and well... BUT it's from both sides. Race has become such a big issue with this that there will be NO answer... Race has clouded this case beyond 'getting to the bottom of it'. I hate that someone is dead... it breaks my heart no matter his color. I wish race would stop being an issue so that evidence could be truly examined. Heck, I wish race would stop being an issue at all... we are all human and deserve to be treated as such. A person's skin color should not matter, we all Bleed red.
